text_embedding_prompts: You will be given a text segment as your source of knowledge. You need to understand the meaning of the text, and generate a question about the text that can be answered by this text segment.
You will be given a text segment as your source of knowledge. Select a key detail and formulate a question about its significance, that can be answered by this text segment.
You will be given a text segment as your source of knowledge. Choose a term or concept and create a question asking for its explanation, that can be answered by this text segment.
You will be given a text segment as your source of knowledge. Find an implication or consequence and ask how it is supported by the text, that can be answered by this text segment.
You will be given a text segment as your source of knowledge. Locate an argument and generate a question about the evidence provided, that can be answered by this text segment.
